mapper.sql: tb_banner.id as tb_bannerid , tb_banner.banner_name as tb_bannerbanner_name , tb_banner.banner_picture_url as tb_bannerbanner_picture_url , tb_banner.banner_jump_type as tb_bannerbanner_jump_type , tb_banner.banner_weight as tb_bannerbanner_weight , tb_banner.create_time as tb_bannercreate_time , tb_banner.modify_time as tb_bannermodify_time ,tb_banner.status as tb_bannerstatus ,tb_banner.banner_content_id as tb_bannerbanner_content_id ,tb_banner.banner_comtent_id_for_pc as tb_bannerbanner_comtent_id_for_pc

tb_banner_material.id as tb_banner_materialid, tb_banner_material.content_name as tb_banner_materialcontent_name, tb_banner_material.creation_time as tb_banner_materialcreation_time, tb_banner_material.update_time as tb_banner_materialupdate_time, tb_banner_material.content_status as tb_banner_materialcontent_status, tb_banner_material.content_type as tb_banner_materialcontent_type, tb_banner_material.content as tb_banner_materialcontent

mapper.insert:
insert into tb_banner
id,
banner_name,
banner_picture_url,
banner_jump_type,
banner_weight,
create_time,
modify_time,
status,
banner_content,

mapper.update:
update tb_banner
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
banner_name = #{record.bannerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
banner_picture_url = #{record.bannerPictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
banner_jump_type = #{record.bannerJumpType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
banner_weight = #{record.bannerWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT},
banner_content = #{record.bannerContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update tb_banner set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, banner_name = #{record.bannerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_picture_url = #{record.bannerPictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_jump_type = #{record.bannerJumpType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, banner_weight = #{record.bannerWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT}, banner_content = #{record.bannerContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update tb_banner set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, banner_name = #{record.bannerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_picture_url = #{record.bannerPictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_jump_type = #{record.bannerJumpType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, banner_weight = #{record.bannerWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT}
mapper.select: select ,, from tb_banner left join tb_banner_material on tb_banner.banner_content_id = tb_banner_material.id where tb_banner.status = false and tb_banner_material.content_status = false and tb_banner_material.content_type = #{contentType} order by tb_banner.banner_weight desc LIMIT 5;
select ,, from tb_banner left join tb_banner_material on tb_banner.banner_content_id = tb_banner_material.id where tb_banner.id = #{id}
